name: Supporting Start-Up Business Ventures, Innovation & Entrepreneurship!
content: Greater Vision is pleased to extend a warm welcome to you to the Executive Training Programme on ‘Supporting Start-up Business Ventures, Innovation & Entrepreneurship’.The upcoming training program in the beautiful city of Geneva-Switzerland to be held from April 11-13, 2019\. For more details please visit: www.globalbizresearch.org E-Mail: training@globalbizresearch.org Website: http://globalbizresearch.org/Genevatraining/
organizers: Greater Vision Conferences & Seminars Organizing, Dubai-UAE & GBRJ
